                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I agree with your last sentiment Laura. I'm curious how positive deviance can be used effectively. It seems to me that it could potentially lead to a lot of biases and that there would be a challenge differentiating causation and correlation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Collapse Subdiscussion Diego Butrich

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Diego Butrich

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Feb 19, 2017 Feb 19 at 5:58pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Design Thinking, Positive Deviance, and Lean Start-up are all methodologies that seek to solve problems with an innovative approach. In addition, they offer a structured way to tackle these problems, try the solutions, and re-iterate; but as with any tool, people have to be trained and prepared to apply them. I have always worked on the commercial side of B2B companies, and both companies promoted innovation and creativity, and assigned resources to foster these skills through workshops, and events. Even though the training was not in a specific methodology, I think both companies adequately built an environment that allowed productive and original discussions towards problem solving. I think Design Thinking would be the most valuable approach for my IBD project, because my team will probably be working with an established company to find a solution to a major problem it faces.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Design Thinking, Positive Deviance, and Lean Start-up are all methodologies that seek to solve problems with an innovative approach. In addition, they offer a structured way to tackle these problems, try the solutions, and re-iterate; but as with any tool, people have to be trained and prepared to apply them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      I have always worked on the commercial side of B2B companies, and both companies promoted innovation and creativity, and assigned resources to foster these skills through workshops, and events. Even though the training was not in a specific methodology, I think both companies adequately built an environment that allowed productive and original discussions towards problem solving.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      I think Design Thinking would be the most valuable approach for my IBD project, because my team will probably be working with an established company to find a solution to a major problem it faces.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Edited by Diego Butrich on Feb 19 at 6:02pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion Hans Klinger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hans Klinger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 2, 2017 Mar 2 at 3:26pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Companies that welcome innovative thinking are demonstrating a willingness at risk taking, which is a necessary condition if designing thinking/positive deviance/lean start-up are to be employed. However, I agree with you that creating an environment that is tolerant of risk and innovation is very different than setting up the structures that are necessary for design thinking. Also, designing thinking and lean start-up require testing and feedback (known as 'prototyping' and 'minimal viable product' respectively), that not all companies - even those that tolerate risk - are willing to expend. Either because of time constraints or financial constraints (even though this testing might be cheaper/faster in the long run), they may not see the value is spending those resources up front. I agree that design thinking is likely to be the most useful for our IBD projects. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Companies that welcome innovative thinking are demonstrating a willingness at risk taking, which is a necessary condition if designing thinking/positive deviance/lean start-up are to be employed. However, I agree with you that creating an environment that is tolerant of risk and innovation is very different than setting up the structures that are necessary for design thinking. Also, designing thinking and lean start-up require testing and feedback (known as 'prototyping' and 'minimal viable product' respectively), that not all companies - even those that tolerate risk - are willing to expend. Either because of time constraints or financial constraints (even though this testing might be cheaper/faster in the long run), they may not see the value is spending those resources up front. I agree that design thinking is likely to be the most useful for our IBD projects.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Carol Macavilca Paredes

For example, in your case Design Thinking has the most valuable approach for your IBD project; however, we are applying another framework which result more convenient.
